benchmark_details.name: LLF-Bench (Learning from Language Feedback Benchmark)
benchmark_details.overview: LLF-Bench is designed to evaluate the ability of AI agents to interactively learn from natural language feedback and instructions, encompassing diverse sequential decision-making tasks such as user recommendations, poem writing, navigation, and robot control.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To provide a research platform for evaluating AI agents' ability to learn interactively from language feedback in a variety of decision-making tasks.

data.source: Diverse sequential decision-making tasks designed for interactive learning using natural language feedback.

methods: OpenAI Gym interface for environment interaction
methodology.calculation: Metrics are evaluated based on the performance of agents after receiving language feedback.
methodology.interpretation: Higher performance indicates better learning from language feedback.
methodology.validation: Test agents using various randomizations of instructions and feedback
